description:
"I`m marrying Usagi because she`s a precious commodity to me," says Reima. "I won`t let you have Usagi," retorts Takeru. Meanwhile, Reima`s scheme to become a "king" is well underway. There is a giant magic circle encompassing the campus, made of none other
than witch hunt festival decorations. A mysterious shadow lurks around student council president, Nagaru.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Usagi ni Datte Kiba wa Aru
うさぎにだって牙はある
